1529245481_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
parasites are too huge to observe with a EM
EM is used to watch atom level(10^-10m) thick thing, and parasite consist of cells. Which means you would not see except cell membrane(10^-9m). Because you can't cut the parasite into this thick, so press it into this thick is reasonable, and the cell membrane would cover everything else.
